game_description: PolarChase is a fun hangout game where you can socialize and play different types of gamemodes.
review_1: Owner, if you see this, this is my application for moderator. I will NEVER kick/ban people who aren’t doing bad things. I will only kick/ban people if they are doing a REALLY bad thing, like glitching into the mod vents, or saying bad slurs. I will only use my moderator for reasonable stuff. Most of the time, I will just play around until I’m supposed to kick/ban people. I do have moderator experience. So please, may i have mod? (Ps, the game is really fun! I hope you add more stuff..)
